original_text: Now Deborah, Rebekah’s nurse, died and was buried under the oak outside Bethel. So it was named Allon Bakuth.
korean_text: 리브가의 유모 드보라가 죽으매 그를 벧엘 아래에 있는 상수리나무 밑에 장사하고 그 나무 이름을 알론바굿이라 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: and was buried under the oak outside Bethel
So it was named Allon Bakuth
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그 곳을 알론 바구드라 불렀다
